summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the compromise of, certain suits instituted by William Cramp and Sons Ship & Engine Building Company, Lewis F. Moody, Allis-Chalmers Manufacturing Company and William M. White against the City of Seattle and now pending in the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division; authorizing the execution of an agreement with S. Morgan Smith Company in respect thereto; authorizing expenditures incidental thereto; and making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor.
